definition: "dot" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 3)/see also 點|点[dian3]
person representing the dead (during burial ceremonies)/to put a corpse on display (after execution)/variant of 屍|尸[shi1]/corpse
population (counted as number of households for census or taxation)/registered residence/residence permit/(in Hong Kong and Macau) bank account
to transfer ownership (of a vehicle, securities etc)/(real estate) conveyancing
great family/rich family/large landlord/conspicuous spender or consumer

sentences.english: Millions of residences remain without power and water.
sentences.chinese: 数百万户家庭依然断水断电。

sentences.english: That fire destroyed 38,000 acres and 21 homes.
sentences.chinese: 火火灾造成了3万8千英亩土地和21户住宅的损失。

sentences.english: Many users have commented that maybe it there should be a return value to signal this condition instead of an exception.
sentences.chinese: 许多苚户说咜应该返回弌个信号而不湜弌个异常。

sentences.english: The black dog was there, too, but the small tin soldier looked straight at the pretty paper house and at the beautiful dancer.

sentences.english: Can the same user ID be login at different places?
sentences.chinese: 户可以于两个地方同时使用吗？

sentences.english: Educated Korea nationality youth W told us a story.

sentences.english: This colony, a five storied building, alone houses nearly 210 families.
sentences.chinese: 这个五层楼高的工寮里，住着近210户人家。

sentences.english: Rammick lives high on a ridge in a 400-home subdivision.
sentences.chinese: 拉米克住在高耸的山脊上一片有400户人家的地方。

sentences.english: All the windows were bricked up.
I want to open an account with [at] a bank.

sentences.english: Treasure chicken city is the old industry town that Shaanxi visits, have state-owned company 361.

sentences.english: Results The salt-iodine concentration in the residents of Hunan Province tended to decrease year by year.
sentences.chinese: 结果湖南省居民户食盐碘含量呈历年降低趋势。

sentences.english: Scaling up to water boards or user federations should be encouraged.
sentences.chinese: 同时鼓励扩大水委员会或用水户联合会。
